players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I have no information to share at this time, but I urge everyone to remain calm and focused."
Bob: "I will continue to investigate and gather more evidence. Remember, the mafioso can lie, so we must be cautious."
Diana: "Let's keep our investigation focused and avoid jumping to conclusions. We need more information before accusing anyone."

You: "I have no information to share at this time, but I urge everyone to remain calm and focused. Let us not rush to judgments or accuse anyone without solid evidence. We must work together as a team to uncover the truth."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
